item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 14th May
item.description:
Email received by Cllr: I had some comments about the street light in Mead Rd at the junction on Churchill Rd at the edge of the Travis Perkins site and adjacent to the public walkway. This light is covered in greenery and is barely visible. I am not sure whose responsibility this is, I would imagine that as the CC is responsible for the lighting, they should ensure it is effective.
Report on FixMyStreet
